body_html:
@yongtang It is still not working. When running tf_tutorials_example_trainer.exe it crashes with

F E:\tensorflow\cc\tutorials\example_trainer.cc:109] Non-OK-status: session->Create(def) status: Invalid argument: No OpKernel was registered to support Op 'Cast' with these attrs.  Registered devices: [CPU,GPU], Registered kernels:
  <no registered kernels>

         [[Node: Cast = Cast[DstT=DT_FLOAT, SrcT=DT_INT32, _device="/cpu:0"](Const)]]

@mrry could the issue be reopened please?
